Tarti:
I don't want to sound rude... but you're not uone of us. Yet here you are, training in the ways of Ertheia... Is that not fate?
Maybe your is a... special way! And Ertheia's wisdom will help you discover your talents!
To get stronger you need to change class.
Once you change class you'll be able to increase your knowledge and learn even more skills. You will learn to handle new weapons and get new abilities.
